mapper.sql: TCCId, Year, Place, ClCode, ClName, Gdp, TrGdp, Rate
mapper.delete: delete from tbl_travelclassgdpcontribute where year=#{0} and place=#{1}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_travelclassgdpcontribute (TCCId, Year, Place, ClCode, ClName, Gdp, TrGdp, Rate) values (#{tccid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{place,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gdp,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{trgdp,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{rate,jdbcType=DOUBLE})

update tbl_travelclassgdpcontribute
Year = #{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Place = #{place,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ClCode = #{clcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ClName = #{clname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Gdp = #{gdp,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
TrGdp = #{trgdp,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
Rate = #{rate,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
where TCCId = #{tccid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
